parameters: Neneko grips the bars of the cell door.\.\. She doesn't even need to try,\. she knows she's definitely not getting this open with any crazy feat of strength anytime soon.
Considering there's a whole mob of very hot headed Kobolds in here,\. that'd probably be a bad idea anyway.
\n<Kobold Escapee>\fs[\v[320]]\fn<\v[319]>It is time to take action!\.\. The dwarves,\. they're going too far!\.\. I barely escaped,\. and I left so many others behind!\fn<GameFont>\fs[30]
\n<\n[1]>Mgrr...\.\.\. There's definitely a whole lot of trouble coming. Just my luck I'm stuck in the middle of it...\.\.\.
It was obvious that there was no breaking out or escaping from this on her own,\. especially with Kaere over there being less than helpful.
She needed to convince the Kobolds to let her out somehow. But would words do the trick?\.\. They might just turn on her if she starts yelling too much.
So much for any goodwill she had...\.\.\.
\n<Kobold Escapee>\fs[\v[320]]\fn<\v[319]>My friends,\. we cannot simply allow this fight with the dwarves to remain at this stalemate any longer!\fn<GameFont>\fs[30]
\n<\n[1]>This lizard really likes hearing themselves talk for how injured they look...\.\.\.
\n<Kobold Escapee>\fs[\v[320]]\fn<\v[319]>That is right!\.\. I've seen many terrible things within their Fortress!\.\. Kobolds in captivity!\fn<GameFont>\fs[30]
\n<Kobold Escapee>\fs[\v[320]]\fn<\v[319]>Our friends and fellow kobolds in chains down below the Fortress!\fn<GameFont>\fs[30]
\n<\n[1]>Huh?\.\. Does the Fortress really have those kinda deep dark secrets?\.\.
The catgirl was doubtful,\. but thinking over it,\. it's not like she really knows anything about the dwarves.
For all she knew,\. they might really have some big dungeon where they keep all the people they don't like.

\n<Kobold Escapee>\fs[\v[320]]\fn<\v[319]>And not just that!\.\. While I was making my escape,\. I saw...\.\.\. some sort of path,\. further down!\.\. I could not guess what the dwarves are hiding,\. but it is surely no good!\fn<GameFont>\fs[30]
Neneko's eyes widen as she listens to the Kobold's ranting.
Neneko grips the bars of the cell door.\.\. She doesn't even need to try,\. she knows she's definitely not getting this open with any crazy feat of strength anytime soon.
Considering there's a whole mob of very hot headed Kobolds in here,\. that'd probably be a bad idea anyway.
She watches as that injured Kobold practically preaches to the audience of Kobolds before them.
They've got the other Kobolds eating out of their hands. She has no idea what they're saying,\. though.
\n<\n[1]>Tsk...\.\.\. if I could just talk to that one,\. maybe...\.\.\.
\n<\n[1]>Oy!\.\. How long are you keeping us here!?\.\. We didn't do anything!\.\.

\n<Kobold Guard>\fs[\v[320]]\fn<\v[319]>Quiet,\. outsider!\.\. We were nice before,\. letting you walk around!\.\. But your spying...\.\.\. now you'll find out we can be not so nice!!\fn<GameFont>\fs[30]
\n<\n[1]>Don't we get a say in this?\.\. C'mon!\.\. \BST[1,Neneko2]I totally don't like dwarves,\. you know?\.\. They're all smelly and have dumb round noses!\.\.
\n<\n[1]>Totally not as cute as your nice,\. big muzzle. Kobolds are just so adorable,\. I'm such a fan. And those scale colors,\. wow~
The Kobold looks flattered and flustered before the other guard bonks them on the head and they clear their throat.
The Kobolds guarding the cage door bark at her in annoyance. Judging by the way they grip their spears,\. Neneko decides maybe yelling at them won't do her any favors.
\n<Kobold Archer>\fs[\v[320]]\fn<\v[319]>Don't do anything smart in here,\. kitty!\fn<GameFont>\fs[30]
\n<\n[1]>Oy!\.\. How long are you keeping us here!?\.\. We didn't do anything!\.\.

\n<Kobold Guard>\fs[\v[320]]\fn<\v[319]>Quiet,\. outsider!\.\. We were nice before,\. letting you walk around!\.\. But your spying...\.\.\. now you'll find out we can be not so nice!!\fn<GameFont>\fs[30]
\n<\n[1]>Don't we get a say in this?\.\. C'mon!\.\. \BST[1,Neneko2]I totally don't like dwarves,\. you know?\.\. They're all smelly and have dumb round noses!\.\.
\n<\n[1]>Totally not as cute as your nice,\. big muzzle. Kobolds are just so adorable,\. I'm such a fan. And those scale colors,\. wow~
The Kobold looks flattered and flustered before the other guard bonks them on the head and they clear their throat.
The Kobolds guarding the cage door bark at her in annoyance. Judging by the way they grip their spears,\. Neneko decides maybe yelling at them won't do her any favors.
\n<Kobold Archer>\fs[\v[320]]\fn<\v[319]>Don't do anything smart in here,\. kitty!\fn<GameFont>\fs[30]
\n<Kobold>\fs[\v[320]]\fn<\v[319]>Hmph!\.\. You are friend with those hairy brutes,\. aren't you?!\fn<GameFont>\fs[30]
\n<Kobold>\fs[\v[320]]\fn<\v[319]>Hmph!\.\. You are friend with those hairy brutes,\. aren't you?!\fn<GameFont>\fs[30]
\n<Kobold>\fs[\v[320]]\fn<\v[319]>Hmph!\.\. You are friend with those hairy brutes,\. aren't you?!\fn<GameFont>\fs[30]
\n<Kobold>\fs[\v[320]]\fn<\v[319]>Hmph!\.\. You are friend with those hairy brutes,\. aren't you?!\fn<GameFont>\fs[30]
\n<Kobold>\fs[\v[320]]\fn<\v[319]>Hmph!\.\. You are friend with those hairy brutes,\. aren't you?!\fn<GameFont>\fs[30]
\n<Kobold>\fs[\v[320]]\fn<\v[319]>Hmph!\.\. You are friend with those hairy brutes,\. aren't you?!\fn<GameFont>\fs[30]
\n<Kobold>\fs[\v[320]]\fn<\v[319]>Hmph!\.\. You are friend with those hairy brutes,\. aren't you?!\fn<GameFont>\fs[30]
\n<Kobold>\fs[\v[320]]\fn<\v[319]>Hmph!\.\. You are friend with those hairy brutes,\. aren't you?!\fn<GameFont>\fs[30]
\n<Kobold Archer>\fs[\v[320]]\fn<\v[319]>Don't do anything smart in here,\. kitty!\fn<GameFont>\fs[30]
\n<Kobold Escapee>\fs[\v[320]]\fn<\v[319]>Please,\. beast friend,\. make haste!\.\. My people is in mortal danger!\fn<GameFont>\fs[30]
\n<Kobold Escapee>\fs[\v[320]]\fn<\v[319]>Use my map...\.\.\. it will guide you right to the heart of the Fortress,\. where my brothers and sisters are kept...\fn<GameFont>\fs[30]
\n<Kobold Escapee>\fs[\v[320]]\fn<\v[319]>Take \i[342] this...\.\.\. It's what I can remember of my own escape...\fn<GameFont>\fs[30]
\n<Kobold Escapee>\fs[\v[320]]\fn<\v[319]>Now...\.\.\. go talk to your froggie friend,\. she knows what we need next.\fn<GameFont>\fs[30]
Neneko notices a table by the cage,\. close enough that she could stick her arm through the bars and touch it.
On the table is a large loaf of what looked like bread.
It looked a little darker and ridged than the bread Neneko was used to,\. but she chalked it up to it probably being some kind of special underground kobold made bread.
\n<\n[1]>Looks like someone left their lunch there.
Normally the Catgirl wouldn't really care about some bread left out in the open,\. of course.
But...\.\.\. well,\. considering the situation,\. and the fact that from her experiences so far the food in the Hole kind of sucked...\.\.\.
Without thinking much of it,\. she reaches through the bars and grabs the round,\. large loaf.
It has a weird,\. squishy texture in her hand,\. and it was sagging off either side from where she was grabbing it.
Perhaps someone more observant would have made note of that,\. maybe even second guessed themselves on calling this thing bread.
Indeed,\. maybe they would have turned it around in their hands some,\. or tried tearing off a piece first.
They would have noticed,\. then,\. the little legs on the bottom side of this squishy loaf,\. or the big innocent eyes that Neneko mistook for seeds.
Very reasonable things for one to do.
Unfortunately for society,\. Neneko was the type of cat who took being told to be reasonable as an insult.
A very rebellious and very leap and never look type of free spirit,\. if you will.
And so,\. quite unreasonably,\. she took this loaf of bread that was very much not a loaf of bread and very much some sort of gigantic,\. unique to the Stratum insect...
And proceeds to take a large bite out of it.
\n<\n[1]>And has a li'l bit of a meaty taste to it.\.\. \BST[1,Neneko2]Not bad!\.\.
She chews slowly,\. savoring and figuring out the taste. Her ears twitch as she can taste a weird slimy filling inside her meal.
\n<\n[1]>Mmm...\.\.\. didn't know Kobolds had jam.\.\. Kind of a weird taste though.
Neneko turns her head,\. glancing at Kaere,\. whose expression could only be described as a mixture of disgusted curiosity and surrender.
Neneko huffs,\. taking another chomp out of the poor twitching thing.
The catgirl shrugs,\. chowing down on the bug.\.\. She uses her arm to wipe her mouth and turns around,\. finished with her meal.
Maybe now with a full stomach she can come up with a plan.
\n<Kobold Escapee>\fs[\v[320]]\fn<\v[319]>...\.\.\. it is now time,\. we cannot simply allow this fight with the dwarves to remain at this stalemate any longer!\fn<GameFont>\fs[30]
\n<Kobold Escapee>\fs[\v[320]]\fn<\v[319]>That is right!\.\. I've seen many terrible things within their Fortress!\.\. Kobolds in captivity!\fn<GameFont>\fs[30]
\n<\n[1]>Wait...\.\.\. \BST[3]Why'd they stop yipping?\.\. They're speaking normally now?\.\.
Neneko turns,\. staring at the Kobolds wearily.
No,\. rather than the Kobold randomly switching languages,\. it was more like...\.\.\. she just suddenly knew what they were saying.
All those yips and yaps became full,\. clear words in her mind.
\n<Kobold Escapee>\fs[\v[320]]\fn<\v[319]>Friends and fellow kobolds in chains down below the Fortress!\fn<GameFont>\fs[30]

\n<Kobold Escapee>\fs[\v[320]]\fn<\v[319]>And not just that!\.\. While I was making my escape,\. I saw...\.\.\. some sort of path,\. further down!\.\. I could not guess what the dwarves are hiding,\. but it is surely no good!\fn<GameFont>\fs[30]
Neneko's eyes widen as she takes in what she'd just heard.
\n<\n[1]>So,\. what were you gonna tell me before?\.\.
\n<\n[3]>...\.\.\. Is now really a good time?\.\.
Neneko waves her hands and shrugs.
\n<\n[1]>You see anything else to do in here?\.\. We got plenty of time for any heart to hearts,\. it looks like!\.\.
\n<\n[1]>C'mon. You were going to tell me anyway!\.\.
\n<\n[1]>And I'd like something else to listen to besides the lizards out there yipping about how much they don't like dwarves or whatever kobolds talk about.
\n<\n[3]>...\.\.\. And I will,\. Neneko.\.\. \BST[2]I will.\.\. Just...\.\.\. give me time,\. and space.\.\. I...\.\.\. need to gather the energy to talk about it again.
Neneko puts her hands on her hips,\. staring at the frog girl,\. clearly having doubts.
\n<\n[3]>...\.\.\. Look.\.\. If you...\.\.\. somehow find a way to get us out of this situation,\. then I promise I'll tell you as much about me as you want.
\n<\n[1]>...\.\.\. Fine,\. I guess that's as good as I'm getting.\.\. Sit tight.
Neneko goes back to the task at hand,\. ignoring the way Kaere hugs herself.
\n<\n[3]>...\.\.\. Given the situation,\. I do not think I have to answer.
\n<\n[1]>What do you think's gonna happen to us?\.\.
\n<\n[3]>...\.\.\. Depends on how generous they feel.\.\. We might just be locked up for a while.\.\. At worst...\.\.\.
Kaere closes her eyes and looks away.\.\. Neneko grimaces.
\n<\n[1]>There's gotta be a way out of this.
\n<\n[3]>Unless you know how to pick a lock,\. we're not leaving this cage on our own,\. Neneko.\.\. \BST[7]Especially not with the entire Kobold tribe paranoid of outsiders.
\n<\n[1]>Well...\.\.\. maybe...\.\.\. maybe we don't gotta pick locks OR pick fights.\.\. \BST[7]Talk 'em into letting us go,\. or something!\.\.
Kaere looks doubtful.\.\. And unwilling to get up.
\n<\n[1]>Hey,\. you know me,\. I'm great with people!\.\. I got you off your ass didn't I?\.\.
Kaere gives Neneko a flat look.
\n<\n[3]>I assure you,\. your ability to gather allies is more an example of your brutish forceful personality than any sort of charisma.
\n<\n[1]>Tsk...\.\.\. well it's better than whatever you've got going on in your little moody phase!\.\. \BST[7]Look,\. just...\.\.\. sit there,\. I'll get us out of here,\. I guess.
Kaere simply looked down at the floor.\.\. She might as well have been counting bugs with the way she was staring at nothing.
Neneko feels like being trapped in here for any longer won't be good for either of their mental health at this rate.
They have some secret way to go deeper...!?\.\.
\n<\n[1]>That way down might be the way they took \N[2]...\.\.\. \BST[7]There might be clues,\. or it might lead me straight to them...!\.\.
Neneko balls her fists. She'd finally gotten an actual lead in this stupid place. If there was anything in this Stratum,\. it was clear that it'd be back in the Fortress.
\n<\n[1]>Damn shorties,\. getting me caught up in this mess...\.\.\. I need that Kobold there to tell me where that secret passage is...\.\.\.
Some sort of dungeon where they're keeping prisoners in chains!?\.\.
\n<\n[1]>The dwarves have some kinda connection with the Company...\.\.\. what if...!!\.\.
It was all clear to her.\.\. If someone took her brother,\. then they'd obviously be in some big prison fortress instead of anywhere out here!\.\.
\n<\n[1]>Damnit...!!\.\. Those damn dwarves...!!\.\. I gotta head back to that fortress!!\.\.
\n<\n[1]>But first I gotta get out of here...\.\.\.
Neneko shakes the bars of the gate loudly and obnoxiously,\. interrupting the Kobold's speech.
\n<\n[1]>Over here!\.\. Hey!!\.\. We're innocent!\.\. We ain't allied with no prisoner taking dwarves over here!!\.\.
\n<\n[1]>Yeah,\. that's right!\.\. I'm totally a friend to you guys!\.\. I've never hurt a Kobold ever!\.\. \BST[1,Neneko2]And I,\. er,\. we don't know anything about Kobolds getting chained up!\.\.
\n<Kobold Escapee>\fs[\v[320]]\fn<\v[319]>How could we believe you,\. outsiders!?\fn<GameFont>\fs[30]
\n<\n[1]>Well,\. s'not like we can prove our innocence while locked up in here,\. but...\.\.\. we can make a deal!!\.\.
\n<\n[1]>Yeah!\.\. A deal!\.\. Think about it!\.\. Ya can't get close to the fortress,\. right?\.\. \BST[1,Neneko2]But I'm an outsider!\.\. It's easier for me to get close!\.\.
\n<Kobold Escapee>\fs[\v[320]]\fn<\v[319]>So you think you would be able to find our missing brethren?\.\. And what about your...\.\.\. green,\. slimy friend there?\fn<GameFont>\fs[30]
Kaere curls up defensively in response to the attention.\.\. Neneko glances behind her and grimaces before turning back to the Kobold.
\n<\n[1]>Er,\. she's my partner!\.\. She's got all sorts of magic tricks and whatever!\.\. \BST[5,Neneko]She'll be able to get me in and get me close!\.\. Totally!\.\.
Or at least Neneko hopes she will,\. because Kaere's track record on plans has leaned towards the "Miss" side of Hit or Miss so far.
\n<Kobold Escapee>\fs[\v[320]]\fn<\v[319]>...\.\.\. It's true that you may have an easier time getting through that treacherous Fortress...\fn<GameFont>\fs[30]
\n<\n[1]>Yeah!\.\. S'not like I'll miss any friends there anyway!\.\. They just think I'm some dumb Beast or whatever!\.\. \BST[5]We're totally allies here,\. you know?!
\n<Kobold Escapee>\fs[\v[320]]\fn<\v[319]>And how will a dumb beast get through their highest security,\. then?\fn<GameFont>\fs[30]
Neneko turns around,\. watching Kaere as she stands up,\. approaching the bars.
\n<\n[3]>We can disguise her.\.\. She'll look like one of their own.\.\. They'll practically welcome her with open arms.\.\. They'd never suspect a dwarf to betray them.
Neneko doesn't even try to hide her surprise.\.\. Could Kaere actually do that?\.\. Honestly,\. she was just making all that stuff about the magic tricks up.
She shakes her head and turns back to the Kobolds.
\n<\n[1]>There you have it!\.\. We can do it!\.\. Just let us out and tell me where your guys are and I'll get 'em in no time!\.\.
The Kobolds look contemplative,\. hissing and talking to each other.
\n<Kobold Escapee>\fs[\v[320]]\fn<\v[319]>...\.\.\. I suppose we don't really have anything to lose.\fn<GameFont>\fs[30]
\n<Kobold Escapee>\fs[\v[320]]\fn<\v[319]>If you get caught then it wouldn't be one of ours losing their head,\. anyway.\fn<GameFont>\fs[30]
\n<Kobold Escapee>\fs[\v[320]]\fn<\v[319]>It's true that the dwarves would be unlikely to send two outsiders to spy on us,\. unfriendly as they are...\fn<GameFont>\fs[30]
\n<Kobold Escapee>\fs[\v[320]]\fn<\v[319]>Fine then!\.\. Fine!\.\. Let them out!\.\. If they want to prove themselves allies then let them!\fn<GameFont>\fs[30]
Neneko resists the urge to loudly celebrate,\. instead pumping her fist and stepping back as the guards open the gate.
\^\n<Kobold Escapee>\fs[\v[320]]\fn<\v[319]>Remember your part of the deal!\.\. We're keeping a close eye on you two!\fn<GameFont>\fs[30]\|
\n<\n[1]>Phew...\.\.\. see,\. knew I could get us out.
\n<\n[1]>Ugh,\. at least be a bit more peppy.\.\. My heart was racing there,\. you know?\.\.
\n<\n[1]>Whatever. Time to hash out that plan...\.\.\. and see if I can get directions from that Kobold...\.\.\.
\n<\n[3]>...\.\.\. Very well.\.\. Come speak to me after.\.\. We'll need to do some preparations before we can transform you into a dwarf.
\n<\n[1]>...\.\.\. Ergh.\.\. You were serious about that?\.\. Do I really gotta...\.\.\.
\n<\n[3]>Do you really need to ask that?\.\.
\n<\n[1]>...\.\.\. Here's hoping I look good short...\.\.\.
\n<\N[1]>Kaere!~\.\. Did I tell ya I'd handle things or what?\.\.
Neneko saunters over to the frog girl with a smirk,\. tail flicking behind her.\.\.
Kaere sighs,\. crossing her arms.\.\. After that confident display it seems like she's gone right back to sulking.\.\.
\n<\N[1]>Come on,\. work with me here.\.\. We've got a way out and a lead,\. yanno?\.\.
Neneko places her hands on her hips,\. frowning at her.\.\.
\n<\N[3]>...\.\.\. You realize this situation is possibly only slightly better than what it was previously,\. right?\.\.
She looks aside,\. rubbing her arm,\. a grimace on her face.\.\.
\n<\N[3]>They've dragged us into their turf war,\. and have sent you on what's effectively a suicide mission.\.\. And they're keeping an eye on me,\. too.\.\.
\n<\N[3]>I don't think they'll let me leave until...\.\.\. or if you manage to come back from this fool's errand.\.\.
\n<\N[1]>Ugh,\. it's not that bad!\.\. \BST[8]You're such a downer,\. you know that?\.\.
\n<\N[1]>I'm used to doing stupid errands for jerks anyway by now.\.\. This is gonna be easy.\.\.
\n<\N[1]>I'll wrap this all up,\. come back,\. scoop ya up and walk outta here,\. then you can tell me how amazing and cool I am and buy me dinner and tell me your life's story like ya promised.\.\.
\n<\N[1]>Anyway,\. I got the map from that dumb shady kobold that talks too much.\.\. And you've got that whole plan for,\. ugh,\. helping me...\.\.\. blend in.\.\.
\n<\N[1]>I'm here now,\. and you've got a plan so...\.\.\. yeah,\. I think we got this.\.\.
Kaere pointedly doesn't make eye contact,\. fussing with her sleeves.\.\.
Neneko buries her face in her hands,\. groaning.\.\.
\n<\N[1]>Please don't tell me that after you were all cool and backed me up you were just making crap up and we don't actually have a plan.\.\.
\n<\N[3]>I was not lying...\.\.\. exactly.\.\. \BST[2]I was just...\.\.\. hypothesizing.\.\.
Neneko hisses in frustration,\. gripping the frog's shoulders.\.\.
\n<\N[1]>Do you actually know any spells or magic!??\.\.
At this,\. Kaere actually looks a bit defensive.\.\.
\n<\N[3]>...\.\.\. I never actually successfully pulled them off.\.\.
Neneko groans,\. letting go of Kaere and stepping back,\. scratching her head in frustration.\.\.
\n<\N[1]>Everytime I start to count on you I swear...\.\.\.
\n<\N[3]>I still can do it.\.\. I know for a fact this spell works.\.\. Things are different now.\.\.
\n<\N[1]>Because if you plan on waving your hands around and saying gibberish and hoping I turn into a dwarf I'm just going to not waste time and go over now.\.\.
\n<\N[1]>Oh,\. good,\. so you were going to just throw a bunch of garbage in a cup and make me drink it,\. great,\. that's way better.\.\.
Kaere looks rather upset,\. but instead of lashing out,\. she takes a deep breath,\. slowly exhaling.\.\.

\n<\N[3]>As I was saying.\.\. It's a potion.\.\. \BST[1]An old hag I knew left a list of formulas behind for me.\.\. I memorized every single one,\. and a few of them were...\.\.\. shapeshifting potions.\.\.
Kaere frowns,\. looking pensive as she crosses her arms.\.\.
\n<\N[3]>I...\.\.\. believe it was due to the location.\.\.
\n<\N[3]>On the Surface there is hardly a trace of Mana,\. and by the time I could obtain any of the ingredients as they were sent up to the city they'd go stale.\.\.
\n<\N[1]>Uh huh...\.\.\. so,\. what,\. since we're down here in magic land,\. the ingredients should work now?\.\.
Kaere wraps her arms around herself,\. looking down.\.\.
\n<\N[3]>...\.\.\. They have to,\. for both of our sakes.\.\.
\n<\N[1]>...\.\.\. Tsk.\.\. Fine.\.\. We've already committed to this plan,\. not like we have any other options and the more we stand around the more those kobolds will look at us funny.\.\.
\n<\N[1]>You sure this potion is even gonna work?\.\.
Kaere nods,\. looking somewhat determined as she reaches into her dress,\. pulling out a messy bundle of papers as she begins fishing through them.\.\.

\n<\N[3]>That old hag was a mess,\. but she knew her stuff,\. and I still have her notes with me.\.\. \BST[1]If you can bring me the ingredients,\. it...\.\.\. will definitely work.\.\. Most likely.\.\.
\n<\N[1]>Not exactly giving me much confidence here...\.\.\.
\n<\N[3]>Let me see...\.\.\. shapeshifting...\.\.\. Here it is,\. "dwarf".\.\.
\n<\N[3]>First we need 10 \ii[5].\.\. Those will be easy enough,\. they grow everywhere down here.\.\.
\n<\N[3]>Then we'll need 2 \ii[113].\.\. \BST[1]It's a fish that has a rock-like exoskeleton.\.\. It seems like they're common in the waters near the Dwarf Fortress.\.\.
\n<\N[3]>If you don't have a fishing rod maybe one of the...\.\.\. friendlier Kobolds will lend you one.\.\.
\n<\N[3]>The last ingredient I need is...\.\.\. \BST[6]!!\.\. The Hair of a Dwarf.\.\.
\n<\N[1]>Seriously?\.\. I mean it's not surprising given what the potion is supposed to be but come on...\.\.\.
\n<\N[3]>I'll leave your method of obtaining some to your discretion...\.\.\. Just...\.\.\. \BST[8]make sure you wash your hands after if you do anything unsightly.\.\.
\n<\N[3]>Yes.\.\. When it comes to the ingredients,\. anyway.\.\. There is still a lot of preparation and mixing to do,\. but that will be my part.\.\.
\n<\N[3]>Hopefully the Kobolds have a spare cauldron they'd be willing to loan me for a day...\.\.\.
She shakes her head,\. turning her attention back to Neneko.\.\.
\n<\N[3]>Regardless.\.\. You just need to worry about gathering everything.\.\.
\n<\N[1]>Sigh...\.\.\. Lately I feel like I've been getting sent on a lot more dumb chores like this than usual...\.\.\.
\n<\N[1]>Yeah,\. yeah.\.\. Don't worry,\. I'm totally looking forward to turning into a chunky shortstack.\.\.
She grumbles,\. waving a hand as she turns around.\.\.
\n<\N[3]>...\.\.\. No,\. nevermind.\.\. We can talk after we leave this place behind.\.\. I'm counting on you.\.\.
\n<\N[1]>...\.\.\. Riiiight.\.\. Just sit tight,\. Kaere.\.\. Your ol' reliable cat's got everything handled like always!\.\.
The sight is something to be reckoned.\.\. The green girl was steering the cauldron with all her might,\. standing on its border,\. surrounded by ominous green smoke...\.\.\. it's only that...
Was is the fall?\.\. Or did she lose her panties before being caged?
Or maybe...\.\.\. she cannot fit them with the cute toad tail she has grown now?
The kobolds in the rooms doesn't seem to care about it,\. and Neneko decided to go with the flow...
\n<\n[3]>Don't come back until you've got the ingredients!\.\. I have to keep steering here!
\n<\N[3]>First we need 10 \ii[5].\.\. Those will be easy enough,\. they grow everywhere down here.\.\.
\n<\N[3]>Then we'll need 2 \ii[113].\.\. \BST[1]It's a fish that has a rock-like exoskeleton.\.\. It seems like they're common in the waters near the Dwarf Fortress.\.\.
\n<\N[3]>If you don't have a fishing rod maybe one of the...\.\.\. friendlier Kobolds will lend you one.\.\.
\n<\N[3]>The last ingredient I need is...\.\.\. \BST[6]!!\.\. The Hair of a Dwarf.\.\.
Neneko and Kaere are taken into a large chamber,\. a mob of Kobolds escorting them both.
Reaching a large cage,\. the two are shoved in,\. and before Neneko could even regain her balance,\. she hears the door loudly shut behind her.
The catgirl grips the bars,\. shouting in outrage.
The Kobolds don't respond to her,\. focused instead on yipping amongst themselves. That one Kobold from before is still ranting and shouting,\. riling them up.
She throws her hands up in a huff,\. pacing around.
\n<\n[1]>What the hell is this all about!?\.\. I didn't even do anything!\.\. They were chill literally minutes ago!\.\. Uggghhhh!!\.\.
\n<\n[3]>They think we're spies for the dwarves.
Neneko whips around to look at Kaere,\. who'd gone and sat in a corner,\. hugging her knees.
The froggy girl looks entirely defeated.\.\. Not very encouraging for a cellmate.
\n<\n[3]>That injured one has the others convinced,\. either way.
\n<\n[1]>Tsk...\.\.\. shit...\.\.\. what are we gonna do?\.\.
\n<\n[3]>...\.\.\. Don't know if there's anything we can do.
She retreats into herself more,\. curling up.\.\. Neneko wants to shout,\. demand Kaere use her brain,\. but it's obvious Kaere will be less than helpful at the moment.
Alright.\.\. Just have to make a plan herself,\. then. See what she has to work with...\.\.\.
